1.0.2.name: wordpress/twounter
1.0.2.description:
Twounter simply returns the number of followers for a twitter username.

You have two options to fetch the number of followers for a username.

You can use the function <?php echo twounter('username') ?> in your template files or you can use the twounter shortcode [twounter]username[/twounter]in post/page editor to return the numbers of followers for the username.
